TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IClientFormatterSink implements class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IChannelSinkBase, class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSink, class System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessageSink

Docs.summary: Marks a sink as a client formatter sink that serializes messages into a stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Formatter sinks must implement both <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessageSink> and <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSink>. IClientFormatterSink combines these into one interface.
